text: Željezno Polje is a village in Žepče Municipality, Federacija Bosne i Hercegovine, Bosnia and Herzegovina.Spahić M. et al. (2000): Bosna i Hercegovina (1:250.000). Izdavačko preduzeće „Sejtarija“, Sarajevo.https://maps.google.com/ According to preliminary results of the Bosnian list of 2013, this village has total of 4,845 inhabitants. In 2014 there have been huge floods that destroyed about 100 houses. It were Evacuated about 2,000 residents.https://www.klix.ba/vijesti/bih/alarmantna-situacija-u- zeljeznom-polju-pocela-evakuacija-i-sela-biljevina/140517004. Many houses are still (January, 2017) not restored. ==Population== {| border="1" cellpadding="7" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 10px 0 10px 25px; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #AAA solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 85%; float: center;" |- style="background: #E9E9E9" |colspan ="7" | Željezno Polje Total population in 2013: 4,845 |- |style="background: bgcolor=lightgreen | Census Year''' |style="background: bgcolor=pink | 1991. |style="background: bgcolor=lightgreen| 1981. |style="background: bgcolor=pink| 1971. |- |Bosniaks |3.947 (90,03%) |3.430 (88,47%) |2.636 (87,95%) |- |Croats |386 (8,80%) |392 (10,11%) |341 (11,37%) |- |Serbs |19 (0,43%) |28 (0,72%) |11 (0,36%) |- |Yugoslavians |20 (0,45%) |14 (0,36%) |3 (0,10%) |- |Others and unknown |12 (0,27%) |13 (0,33%) |6 (0,20%) |- |style="background: bgcolor=lightblue |Total''' |4,384 |3,877 |2,997 |} Book: "Nacionalni sastav stanovništva - Rezultati za Republiku po opštinama i naseljenim mjestima 1991.", statistički bilten br. 234, Izdanje Državnog zavoda za statistiku Republike Bosne i Hercegovine, Sarajevo.Internet – Source: "Popis po mjesnim zajednicama" - http://www.fzs.ba/Podaci/nacion%20po%20mjesnim.pdf. ==See also== *Žepče *Meokrnje ==References== Category:Villages in Bosnia and Herzegovina Category:Žepče
